name: Boby Body Buddy
description:
Boby's body has been somehow dragged to the deepest part the sewers. Help Boby the Slug playing as himself and his artifitial body, to explore the dungeony sewer, solve cooperative puzzles and find his precious organic body.

Boby can leave his body and explore otherwise inaccessible spots jumping higher and climbing the walls, while the body explores a different zone.

Controls:

  • Move left-right: A-D or arrow keys
  • Jump: Space (also wall jump with Boby)
  • Release Boby: B while being together
  • Switch Boby and the body controls: B while being separated

A game made for gbjam 5, imitating Game Boy games gameplay and hardware limitations.
